short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click it when you need to feel normal!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a handy button to your browser toolbar - when you click it, a popup will appear with a reassuring message. Just sent a work email? Concerned about those weird search terms you just put into Google? Don't worry - you're normal!

This button/extension is purely intended for fun and encouragement! Just a plain HTML/CSS popup window when you choose to click on it.
